feed.title: Tauticord Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Support for Tautulli v2.15.0.
  • [REMOVED] Support for Tautulli v2.14.0 and v2.14.1. See announcement.

Related PRs

  • [chore] Add Tautulli v2.15.0 support, drop v2.14.0 and v2.14.1 support by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.7.3...5.8.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [REVERT] Remove webhook and API server introduced in v5.9.0 due to instability issues.
  • For those who have already upgraded to v5.9.0 and had auto-migrated configurations, this should not require remain backwards compatible.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.8.0...5.10.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] New API and webhooks functionality
  • Ingest "Recently Added" webhooks, store in database
  • [ADDED] Display "Recently Added" count under per-library stats. See documentation for more details.

Related PRs

  • [feat] Add API + webhook ingestion by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/236

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.8.0...5.9.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Migration script to auto-add new "RecentlyAdded" section to each per-library stat in config file
  • "RecentlyAdded" is also now optional, so even if migration fails, config parsing should be able to fallback to default values

Related PRs

  • [fix] Add auto-migration for RecentlyAdded config by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.9.0...5.9.1

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIXED] Migration script bug causing parsing errors and migrations to fail
  • Added warning logs with migration failure reasons

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.9.1...5.9.2
